Name: Mr Jorries!
About the game: Dare to test your visual, mental and platforming skills in this Arcade Platform Shooter! Mr Jorries has been called to the Jabco World to shoot away 'Boinks', as they infest the world with their attack, equipment, etc. Swim, Fly or Swing Your way through to achieve the mission. The Jabco World is supposed to be a happy nice chill place at the night sky, but since Mr Jorries has been called he feels he can never catch a break. Your visual ability will be tested, your mental ability will be tested, your platforming skills will be very much tested. Collect Junkie Wunkie Coins, Shoot away Boinks with not only 1 but special guns with different attack. The Boinks will have the power to shoot back at you. So by any means necessary you know what to do. This wonderful retro graphics within this game has been done by Astronaut Curve. He did a wonderful job. This might relate to real life in what you feel. Having the hassle to work so much just for a break. As they say, No Worries Mr Jorries!
